QuestData.Title: Meet Us at Starfall Outpost
QuestData.Description: The archmage has uncovered a potential Shadow Council presence in the valley. He asked me to let you know.$B$BAs soon as you can, join us at Starfall Outpost. We're going to need your muscle to root them out, commander.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Archmage Khadgar at Starfall Outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello again, $n. You're just in time.$B$BWe've tracked the Shadow Council to a nearby village. I suspect that Gul'dan is with them.
